title: Looking for a few HOFers with Old Mill backs
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Looking for a few HOFers with Old Mill backs
posts.post_content:
These are tough cards and I'm willing to pay strong prices for them.  I'm interested in any condition, but I may not want to pay much of a premium for a super beat up card.

Bresnahan portrait
Chesbro
Clarke bat
Clarke portrait
Cobb bat on shoulder
Crawford throwing
Davis G.
Evers portrait
Flick
Johnson portrait
Keeler portrait
Lajoie portrait
Matty white cap
Tinker hands knees
Tinker portrait
Young bare hand
